channel.title: [PI] Ping command so players can check the lag?
channel.description:
Does anyone know how or where to get a command like this? I tried googling and got squat. If there isn't a command like this- how could I write it? If someone could help me I'll write a tutorial for it, but I really want to boost my java skills by writing my own unique command.
The reason I want this is some people say the server lags, It'd be cool to show them that it's not the server and it's the connection between the player. I know there will be some client side stuff to this too, so this will also be posted in the dev and client section.
What can I use to measure the delay in packets? I'm a novice at java, I can learn alot with this. :D
Thanks, Gergy xWeedscape
